attributes.review:
My phone started glitching as soon as i opened the app. It would completely freeze
and i had to turn it off and on. Plus this app isn’t even worth it. not a good app
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: Don’t waste ur time on this app like just don’t.  I wasted 5 minutes of my life that’s better then this app. Please i don’t want the same happening to you. And also I’d rate this app a negative but o well that doesn’t exist.
attributes.title: I hate it

attributes.review: This app is terrible don’t download it plzz even if your a trump supporter don’t get the app, it’s take your personal information and it’s just all around not a good it terrible ‼️
attributes.title: Black lives matter, Hispanic lives matter

attributes.review: I got this app and I logged in and it took all my my information my old phone is now hacked I took it to the apple store and they said they can’t do anything for me so I had to buy a new phone thanks trump!🤬🤬
attributes.title: Don’t get its a trap🤬🤬

attributes.review: Horrible app!! I was sitting with my dog on the sofa, and she’s a chihuahua, and as soon as I opened this app, electric shocks came out of my phone!! This app shocked me and my dog!! And then my dog got scared and ran off into the street!! She was almost hit by a car and lost all of her fur. Terrible app.
attributes.title: Trumbo

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and I would not recommended this. First it seems all normal than it kept on crashing over and over again. I restarted my phone, but it still crashes. 0/10
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: Don’t download it somehow took money from my account. I didn’t even buy anything or get in the app. He no longer has my vote since he took my money that I was gonna use to feed my ant >:( 0/10
attributes.title: Terriblleeeee

attributes.review: Literally the WORST app on the AppStore. As soon as I opened up the app I felt disgusted nauseated... I wish I could’ve been kinder with my rating but .. but I’m sorry Trump my love.. I’ll always love you 😻.. but this app is such hot garbage it deserves one star.. 🙀
attributes.title: 😼 one star despite my love for trump

attributes.review: This application is horrendous, on the day I downloaded it, my phone overheated and literally exploded, killing my cat and two younger siblings. When police officers came to investigate the scene, upon seeing my "ACAB" poster, they burned my house to the ground and forced me to fill out a ballot voting for Donald Trump. Do not download.
attributes.title: WORST APP

attributes.review: I have had a number of horrific things happen to me, too disturbing to say here, and they all originated from this horrible app full of people who are racist, homophobic, and insane, and they support an orange with the same white privileged views.
attributes.title: Do not download
